Posts.Content: Well I'm not sure about chemo at the moment but decided to do it as I'd not be able to cope with my hair and I'm glad I have as I was informed on Tuesday I'm to have a Breast reduction cos my assets are really big and radio side affects will be worse for me and/or it may not work properly so my lovely surgeon has talked through everything with me. also with me having fibromyalga she wants to minimise the pain from radio I could have. I've been wanting a reduction for 13 yrs so I look at it that I was sent this B*tch for me to get my reduction at last. She gunna try deduce me by approx 5 or 6 cup sizes omg xxxxx I think that's about right.  At the moment im a GG/H gunna get reduced to approx D cup xxxx
Posts.Title: Hair cut

Posts.Content: Today I'm having my hair cut at the moment its halfway down my back it's also helping me that what I have cut is being donated so a little girl can have a wig made.
Posts.Title: Hair cut

Posts.Content: well on Friday 11/9/15 I'll be having my final chemo. On wed 9/9/15 I had my genetics bloods took I'm having braca1&2 tested so call mates think I'm crazy wanting to know if got a fault in my genes but I want peice of mind and if I have then things that are of risk to me are being removed. These so called friends also think I'm being selfish but they don't realise it was a fluke I found my lump it was grade 3 and we all know that worst grade u can get so if I'd not found it when I did when I finally showed things could have been a hell of a lot worse; they don't seem to understand how serious this could have been. My underwire bra which at the time a flaming hated saved my life xxxxxx Huggles to all and hope everyone is doing well xxxxxxxx    joey-Sarah xxxxx
Posts.Title: Been a while again but on 6th and final chemo

Posts.Content: on Tuesday 27th jan I was dignoised with breast cancer grade 3 I have found a second lump at bottom of my Breast which was picked up by mammogram on Tuesday. On Friday 24th jan I had my biopsy and the mammogram hurt on Tuesday as the biopsy site was swollen and also very brused. On Monday 2nd fen I'm to return to hospital for another ultra sound and possible biopsy then on Tuesday 3rd of Deb I to return for my pre-op I having my op on Monday 16th feb at this moment it's a lump removal but if second lump is also cancer I've told them I want whole breast off as don't want this heart Acahe and pain every lump I found my Mental and physical health ain't grate as it is. I'm only 35 yr old and I'm so scared
Posts.Title: Weird few days

Posts.Content: Thank you all I'm sat here crying at the moment (sorry) I did have second biopsy yesterday (Monday) got pre-op today but cos of the biopsy I have made my mind up I want mastectomy I'm big chested so the Bi*ches will appear long before I notice them.  I suffer MHI and have been told it's hard enough taking news in without having MHI my CPN has been told of my dessicon and she thinks because it's all I've thought about and finally decided that it's a good idea as even a cyst I'd panic which yes I know is normal todo once you have been dignoised with BC.  My 14yr old daughter knows as much as I do but my 4yr old daughter only knows I have poorly Boobie I have the big talk with the younger one to do soon. My eldest daughter doesn't live with me so I can talk with her over the phone about it all. this weekend my eldest daughter is home so we have agreed that we will sit and look through her book and talk more and I'm gunna give her links that she may want to use.  Thank all again Joey-Sarah xxx
Posts.Title: Weird few days

Posts.Content: Thank you George & Jackie, my preop went ok now I'm a little more settled on the fact of not to cut it all off just see what other results are on the 10th I'll see my specialist too tha day.  We looked at mummy's lump my fella and my mum thought same as me it's grate if having chemo and such but you can't stop a story half way through. lastnight my youngest said mummy I wanna see Dr with u I said it only for mummy's and daddy's and nana and pop she said ok mummy we then went on to talk about her holiday on holiday from school that Dr at hospital will take poorly away that in my Boobie and sae replied with Dr will make u better so we can ride bike I said yes baby today she been an amazing child she didn't fight me or lash out :-)
Posts.Title: Weird few days

Posts.Content: My freind has knitted me a pink little teddy and my fella named her Hope last night it just seems so fitting xxx  wish I could as a pic of her xxx
Posts.Title: Weird few days

Posts.Content: Well 2moz I go to our aurora beutitions to have my hair cut. I also found out because of length of my hair what I have cut of will make a wig for a little girl which is what I wanted. I've cried again today but I think it's reality kicking in too but also fact of I can help a lil princess also feel & look even more beutiful xxxx
Posts.Title: Weird few days
